mapper.select: select emp_no , emp_name , emp_id , emp_pwd , email , address , phone , emp_profile , d.dept_code , dept_name , j.job_code , job_name , to_char(hire_date, 'YYYY"년"MM"월"DD"일"') as "hire_date" , ent_yn , ent_date , status from employee e left join department d on (e.dept_code = d.dept_code) left join job j on (e.job_code = j.job_code) where emp_id = #{empId} and ent_yn = 'N'

select emp_name , dept_name , vac_remaining from employee e left join department d on (d.dept_code = e.dept_code) left join vac_recode v on (e.emp_no = v.emp_no) where e.emp_no = #{eNo} and vac_recode = (select max(vac_recode) from vac_recode where emp_no = #{eNo} )
select e.dept_code , t.dept_name , emp_name , email from employee e join department t on e.dept_code = t.dept_code
